meanings.sent1: The view from the top of the hill was superber than I had imagined.
meanings.sent2: The cake was superber than any dessert I had ever tasted.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was so superber that it sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her skills on the piano were superber than a maestro's.
meanings.sent5: The superber sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.

meanings.definition: Excelling others in some good quality
meanings.sent1: She was the superber student in the class, always acing her exams.
meanings.sent2: The athlete was superber than his competitors in speed and agility.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to climb trees was superber than the dog's.
meanings.sent4: His leadership skills were superber than anyone else's in the team.
meanings.sent5: The superber taste of her homemade cookies won over everyone at the bake sale.
